game_description: Fly in modern jet fighters with moving parts, and more detailed cockpits. Either go head to head with other players online or work your way through the story based missions in order to earn and unlock more powerful and maneuverable aircraft. Features new music, and new scenery.
review_1: Acceptable graphics and good performance, but without a reference in the controls to zoom or judder to the limit of the stick (where are the edges of the control axis?) The movement on board results in a dizzying experience in most turns, especially when there are enemies around i prefer 1st person inside the cockpit and not outside, this is a broken immersive experience (like an arcade) than a "made for vr" experience.
review_2: The game does what a game should do, entertain you, but it can be better of course, thanks to the creators for letting the game free, because of this game i made my dream of flying a fighter plane came true, although i would like this game more if they put on spanish subtitles or made a latin version of it, to get the full experience, hope they update soon so i can choose new stuffs and play online with more people, i had a lot of fun playing it, even though it is not in my native lenguaje, i had to ask to my son if he can write this, so all of you can read me and understand the feeling :) i had dreams of being Rick Hunter while playing it, (i`d like it more if they put on more music on the soundtrack, think it would be so muche better) the game is underrated, should be more popular if you dream about flying a fighting plane.
review_4: For this to be a free pilot game on oculus is in sane But,no one plays multiplayer
review_5: Good fun game. But the some of the cockpitâ€™s a broken like the a-10 warthog and the f-14 tomcat
